author: Simon Difford
description: The fruity alternative to a Moscow Mule.
name: Raspberry Mule
recipeIngredient: 15 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0Â°brix)

recipeInstructions.text: MUDDLE raspberries in base of shaker
Add next three ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into ice-filled glass
TOP with ginger beer, lightly stir and serve with straws
